page.title: 15Bloomfield Garden Centre
page.content: Garden centres are very popular in and around Colchester because there are so many people who own their own homes. Bloomfield Garden Centre is on Berechurch Hall Road,opposite Camulodunum Way.Previously it was owned by private families,but the bungalow with five acres of land was built in 1931 for Mr. Ashcroft,a disabled man who was in a wheelchair. He ran it as a smallholding from 1931 to 1946 and then sold up and went to Canada. The land was split up and now there is only three quarters of an acre with the bungalow. Mr. and Mrs. Bloomfield opened it as a garden centre in 1967 and have been running it ever since.
